library(yaml)

config <- list(
  project = list(
    type = "website"
  ),
  
  website = list(
    title = "ajgre-crnyhs-blog",
    navbar = list(
      right = list(

        list(icon = "github", href = "https://github.com/your-github-account"),
        list(icon = "twitter", href = "https://twitter.com/your-twitter-account")
      )
    )
  ),
  
  format = list(
    html = list(
      theme = "cosmo",
      css = "styles.css"
    )

  list(
